doc.title: Pray for Light
doc.plot: When his wife Danielle is reported missing, Jeremy Sykes ignores the warnings of local police and ventures into the deep Carolina wilderness to look for her with the help of his brother-in-law and a mysterious stranger. Jeremy soon discovers that where he searches is no ordinary woods but a terrifying haunting ground ruled by a malicious entity and its damned minions. Even as Jeremy desperately struggles against impossible odds, Danielle is locked in a struggle to save her own immortal soul.
